file.title: Flat style

p.text: Specifies view map object on the form (flat type, volume).

p.textAll: All possible button style are described in Auxiliary words -> button style .

samples.sample: Options for the 's Style button in the button Window1.Knopa1.Stil button = "normal" Window1.Knopa1.Stil button = PodnimayuschiysyaWindow1.Knopa1.Stil button = Window1.Knopka2.Stil knopkiWindow1.Knopa1.Stil button = Window1.Tekst1.Tekst
